desert.speaker: me
desert.text: Did the camel just say hello?

desert.speaker: bedouins
desert.text: What are you doing here, stranger?

desert.speaker: me
desert.text: To be honest, I am a little lost. Maybe you can help me?

desert.speaker: bedouins
desert.text: Weâ€™d be happy to, but first we need to prepare the tea.

desert.speaker: bedouins
desert.text: Can you help us to get water and something to eat?

desert.speaker: me
desert.text: Eum... sure. {{Sure let me go to the supermarket real quick}}
